# Crime Analysis
### Jessica Wheeler, Sharon Teo, Jean Jecha

##Introduction

#Load Dallas Crine Dataset
#Original dataset from https://www.dallasopendata.com/Public-Safety/Police-Incidents/tbnj-w5hb

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

#Create dataframe named dallas and read in JSON file
dallas = pd.read_json('https://www.dallasopendata.com/resource/qqc2-eivj.json')
dallas.head()
